sense.name: complain
sense.examples: She's always beefing about something. You probably don't want me to post here because I was beefing with you on another forum. You shouldn't beef about the boss around the watercooler.

sense.name: BEEF UP: make strong or stronger
sense.examples: The way he beefed up, he had to at least suspect that there were steroids in what he was getting from Anderson. As head of the Kenya wildlife service, he beefed up the country's national parks. The company said it was beefing up its security measures following a significant data breach.
